Test Name: MAYOCOMPLETE ACUTE MYELOID LEUKEMIA, 11-GENE PANEL, VARIES
Purpose: To generate accurate, reproducible, and reliable results for an 11-gene panel assessing mutations relevant to acute myeloid leukemia.
Container: Not specified (varies with specimen collection requirements)
Equipment: Next-generation sequencing platform, PCR thermal cycler, centrifuge, Agilent Bioanalyzer/TapeStation
